Posts.Content: Hi Jo Jo Thank you for your reply. I have just finished radiotherapy and was fine. I had 20 sessions including 5 boosters. My chest aches and skin feels sore at times but nothing too bad. Good luck with all your sessions.
Posts.Title: starting herceptin

Posts.Content: HiÂ  I was disgnosed with breast cancer in August and following surgery, I underwent chemotherapy and radiotherapy. I am about to start herceptin but I am worried about side effects as chemo made me so ill.
Posts.Title: starting herceptin

Posts.Content: Hi Thank you for your reply. I am also about yo start tamoxifen. I feel like it is never ending. Trying to juggle all of this as well as looking after my children is hard at times. I was so ill with chemo that they had to sedate me. I am dreading the herceptin incase it is the same.
Posts.Title: starting herceptin

Posts.Content: Hi JoDec Hope you are well. Have you had your second Herceptin injection and if so was it ok? I am due to see my oncologist this friday to find out when I start mine. Take care.x
